current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text: To modify the boundary of the Shiloh National Military Park located in the States of Tennessee and Mississippi, to establish Parker’s Crossroads Battlefield as an affiliated area of the National Park System, and for other purposes.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

committee-name.#text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

Parker’s Crossroads Battlefield in the State of Tennessee

The

The City of Parkers Crossroads and the Tennessee
			 Historical Commission shall jointly be the management entity for the affiliated
			 area.

may provide technical assistance and
